description: Journalist Louisa Lim and her husband reunited with her in-laws after more than two years.Â  Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Tears and traffic: A road trip in Malaysia yields plenty of pleasant (and not so pleasant) surprises
title_page: Tears and traffic: A road trip in Malaysia yields plenty of pleasant (and not so pleasant) surprises | The Straits Times
maintext:
Apart from the lone busker doing a cheerless jig in an ill-fitting Winnie the Pooh costume at 8pm, the once-bustling streets in front of the Dutch Square, Melaka's most famous landmark, are quieter than I remember.
We drop a few notes in Wretched Winnie's coin box out of pity and he perks up significantly, waving his arms at my two frightened children.
